entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of thundershowers overnight. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 6. Forecast issued 12:23 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 10. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 12:23 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 12:23 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
